item.title: 🧑‍🔬 Mushroom Trader
item.description: ![[notes/images/mushroom_trader.png]] About Mushroom Traders are added as part of the Mushroom Fields makeover. They spawn within Mushroom Houses. Behavior Mushroom Traders will trade the Button Mushrooms Music Disc along with other Mushroom related items from both Vanilla Minecraft and Biome Makeover.
